data.name: DropTargetDragEvent
desc: The DropTargetDragEvent is delivered from the drop target to the currently registered drop target listener.
It contains information regarding the current state of the operation to enable the operations initiator to provide the end user with the appropriate drag over feedback.

items.name: Context
lines: The drop target context of the current drag operation.

items.name: DropAction
lines: This value represents the currently selected drop action.

items.name: LocationX
lines: The cursor's current x location within the window's coordinates.

items.name: LocationY
lines: The cursor's current y location within the window's coordinates.

items.name: SourceActions
lines: This value represents the action or actions supported by the source.
This may be a combination of arbitrary source actions except ACTION_DEFAULT.
To combine different actions use a logical OR.
